name: JBoss Demo Central
body:
### Welcome to JBoss Demo Central
This is the central location for all public JBoss Demos. Please note that we are still under construction, expect more demos shortly.

The maintainer of the JBoss Demo Central are:

* Thomas Qvarnstr√∂m
* Kenny Peeples
* Eric D. Schabell
* Christina Lin

## Contribution
We are grateful for all the contribution that we can get. If you like to contribute to an existing demo project just fork it's repo and do a pull request, and if you want to contribute with your own demo contact us and we can either add you to the organization or create a new repo that you can fork and do pull requests to.

## Demos
[Here](https://github.com/jbossdemocentral) is a list of all the demo repositories.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
